description: There's chicken and waffles, but have you had chorizo and waffles? Try this recipe loaded with tomatoey baked beans, chorizo, poached eggs and herbs.
keywords: Savoury Waffles with Baked Beans Chorizo & Egg
name: Savoury Waffles with Baked Beans Chorizo & Egg Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 425 g SPC baked beans in rich tomato

recipeInstructions.text: Serve waffles warm topped with baked beans, chorizo and poached egg.
